name: Rage Wars
description:
Get prepared for the FIRST EVER shooter game based on Rage Comics ! Rage Wars is a well-made action game with a variety of weapons, worlds and enemies to challenge with.
A game where you have either a storyline or an Arena mode to challenge your friends over Game Center!
Simple controls let you take over the battlefield easily.

Features:

- Storyline with 30 levels, lots of enemies and cut-scenes to catch up with dramatic story.
- Arena mode - Kill as much zombies as you can.
- Dynamic main character facial rage expressions.
- Most of Rage Faces used just in one game for your joy.
- Lots of Y U NO, FUUUUU, and Trolling moments you will never forget.
- Collect potatoes to unlock different weapons!

Tips:

- Use your RAGE button whenever you're in trouble!

So Y U NO TRY IT OUT?

True Story ;)
